title: Host a wedding
beginning: Pay 1 gold for each scheme in your hand
end: If the left 2 timeline schemes are the same color, take the lower power in gold

title: Privilege
beginning: Pay 5 gold
end: Draw 1

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: Threaten the least powerful green dungeon scheme
end: If you have 100 or less gold, draw its time

title: Create a charity
beginning: Take 1 Privilege from the bank into your hand
end: Put 1 Privilege from the bank face down on your deck

title: Serve as Sheriff
beginning: If you have 5 or less schemes in hand, draw the highest time in play
end: Put 1 Privilege from the bank face up on your discard

title: Fight for freedom
beginning: Appoint 1 Privilege from the bank to the court
end: Draw until you have 6 schemes in hand

title: Found a secret order
beginning: Revive your top discard scheme's time
end: Draw the most powerful dungeon scheme's time

title: Jailbreak
beginning: Threaten the most powerful yellow dungeon scheme
end: Threaten the most powerful green dungeon scheme

title: Dub a Dame in shining armor
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, revive its time
end: Otherwise, threaten it

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: If the left timeline scheme is red, take its power in gold
end: Otherwise, threaten it

title: Entrap the Chamberlain
beginning: If the left timeline scheme is yellow, take its power in gold
end: If your top discard scheme is yellow, take 10 gold

title: Spread the rebellion
beginning: If you have 100 or less gold, threaten the rightmost yellow timeline scheme
end: Otherwise, threaten the leftmost yellow timeline scheme

title: Torture the spymaster
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, threaten the leftmost green timeline scheme
end: Otherwise, draw as many as it has time

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: Take the highest dungeon power in gold
end: Take the highest power in play in gold

title: Give fealty
beginning: Pay the highest power in play in gold
end: Take the right timeline scheme's power in gold

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: If your top discard scheme has 20 or less power, take it in gold
end: If you took gold, appoint it to the court

title: Reclaim your rights
beginning: Pay your top discard scheme's power in gold
end: Take 25 gold

title: Declare bankruptcy
beginning: If your deck is empty, take 25 gold
end: Put 1 scheme from your hand face down on your deck

title: Smuggle contraband
beginning: Take your top discard scheme's power in gold
end: Put it face down on your deck

title: Marry the Duchess
beginning: Pay five times the left timeline scheme's time in gold
end: Take twice its power in gold

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Take twice your top discard scheme's power in gold
end: If it is not yellow, appoint it to the court

title: Become a saint
beginning: If you have 5 or less schemes in hand, revive 5
end: If your discard is empty, draw 5

title: Defeat the Church
beginning: Revive until your top discard scheme is not green
end: If your top discard scheme has 20 or less power, draw 5

title: Vote in the College of Electresses
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, draw 5
end: Otherwise, revive 5

title: Rule alongside your mother
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive 5
end: If your discard is not empty, draw 5

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: Pay 1 gold
end: Draw your entire deck
